description:
Get ready—Ben Shapiro is live at Cornell University in Bailey Hall, hosted by the Young Americans for Freedom chapter. Ben will take on America’s biggest issues from center stage, uncensored and with the facts you won’t hear anywhere else. Then, it’s gloves off as he faces questions from students in a no-holds-barred Q&A. Watch for an explosive night of intellectual firepower they can’t teach you in school.
